Chocolate Labrador, Shar Pei
Male
Adult -  5-6 years old
Large - 73 lbs

Introducing Brody (The Heavyweight Lover Brody B)! Brody is a 3-year old labrador / pit /boxer mix.  He is a very sweet dog who gets along very well with other dogs and even cats.  He’s proven himself to be gentle and well behaved around young children and other people.  Brody is an active pup who requires at least two walks a day for about 30 – 40 minutes each and he really enjoys social / play time with other dogs.  Lastly, he also needs some one-on-one attention to satisfy his need for love.  He really loves love.  

Brody is beloved by his family who is absolutely heartbroken they are no longer able to care for him.
Call Us to Arrange a Meeting

Adopt A Pet is a San Francisco Bay Area dog rescue organization run by a group of dedicated volunteers. We save dogs from death at overcrowded shelters and find them loving, happy forever homes. 
Now in our twelfth year, RDR is stronger than ever, and has saved the lives of over 6,000 animals. Are you looking to adopt a dog in the San Francisco Bay Area? Look no further – visit us online at www.rocketdogrescue.org.
We have had an amazing year in 2016, saving the lives of over 700 dogs! From taking in 70 dogs in a Fresno hoarding case …
Adoption Event at Pacifica Petfood Express
Come on down to our monthly adoption event, and meet adoptable rocket dogs.
